Not necessarily the one you’ve paid for or one you’ve bought into. And certainly not the one that takes the most time.

Being mindful that your solution might come from anywhere—back of mind, perhaps, or in a crevice, or some previously unknown source—is a great way to discover all sorts of workarounds that might work.
